mapper.select: /*SellerBillingMapper.selectSellerCompanysBillingList(품목현황 조회)*/ SELECT seller_memb_no , seller_biz_no , seller_company_name , sales_amount2 , sales_amount1 , sales_amount , collect_amount , (CASE WHEN collect_amount = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (collect_amount / sales_amount) * 100 END) AS collect_amount_rate , end_amount , expiration_avg FROM ( SELECT memb.memb_no AS seller_memb_no , memb.business_no AS seller_biz_no , memb.company_name AS seller_company_name , SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(sales.reg_date::date, 'YYYY.MM') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'yyyy.mm')::date - INTERVAL '2 month', 'yyyy.mm') THEN sales.total_sales_amount${groupCode} ELSE 0 END) AS sales_amount2 , SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(sales.reg_date::date, 'YYYY.MM') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'yyyy.mm')::date - INTERVAL '1 month', 'yyyy.mm') THEN sales.total_sales_amount${groupCode} ELSE 0 END) AS sales_amount1 , SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(sales.reg_date::date, 'YYYY.MM') = #{startDate} THEN sales.total_sales_amount${groupCode} ELSE 0 END) AS sales_amount , SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(sales.reg_date::date, 'YYYY.MM') = #{startDate} THEN sales.total_collect_amount${groupCode} ELSE 0 END) AS collect_amount , SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(sales.reg_date::date, 'YYYY.MM') = #{startDate} THEN sales.end_amount${groupCode} ELSE 0 END) AS end_amount , SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(sales.reg_date::date, 'YYYY.MM') = #{startDate} THEN sales.expiration_avg${groupCode} ELSE 0 END) AS expiration_avg FROM tb_sales_monthly_data AS sales JOIN cdf.tb_memb_info AS memb ON sales.seller_biz_no = memb.business_no WHERE sales.is_delete = 'N' AND sales.buyer_biz_no = #{buyerBizNo} GROUP BY ROLLUP ((memb.memb_no, memb.business_no, memb.company_name)) ) A WHERE (A.sales_amount2 + A.sales_amount1 + A.sales_amount + A.collect_amount + A.end_amount + A.expiration_avg) > 0
